==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|いろ|む|じ}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=いろむじ|色|tr1=iro|t1=color|無地|tr2=muji|t2=plain, solid}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|いろむじ}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いろむじ}}

# A [[single]]-[[color]]ed [[kimono]] that may be worn by [[married]] and [[unmarried]] [[women]] alike. They are mainly worn at [[tea ceremony|tea ceremonies]]. The [[dyed]] [[silk]] may offer some [[pattern]]s, but they are made within the [[fabric]] and [[monochrome]] instead of being [[print]]ed.

====Coordinate terms====
* {{ja-r|着物|きもの}}: a traditional Japanese robe-like garment, now generally worn only in formal occasions.
